content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. I’d be happy to help you with your electrical service request. May I please have your name to get started?
Why do you need my name? Just tell me if someone can come fix my breaker.
I understand, and I want to help as fast as possible. I do need your name so we can set up your appointment and make sure everything goes smoothly. Could you please provide your name?
No, just schedule someone already. Why should I trust this bot with my info anyway?
I apologize for any frustration. I need your name to continue with the scheduling process. Would you prefer to speak with a human for assistance?
reason: Customer refused to provide name; requires human operator to proceed.

content: Hello, this is Judy with XYZ Home Services. I completely understand your concerns, and I'm here to help personally. If you’re more comfortable, I can answer any questions and assist you with booking—no problem. Would you mind sharing just your first name or whatever you’re comfortable with to get started? We keep all your information confidential.
